oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Artist in Residence - Buddy Miller - 2010-08-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: First of three Artist in Residence appearances. Performance by Buddy Miller and others in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame on August 10, 2010. Special guests include Tom T. Hall; Emmylou Harris; Bill Frisell; the McCrary Sisters. Band includes Bill Frisell; Marco Giovino; Byron House;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Miller; Emmylou Harris; the McCrary Sisters; Tom T. Hall; Bill Frisell;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performance includes; All My Tears; That's How Strong My Love Is; No Good Lover (with Ann McCrary); Shelter Me (with the McCrary Sisters); Blowing In The Wind (the McCrary Sisters); Know My Name (the McCrary Sisters); Worry Too Much (with the McCrary Sisters); Gasoline and Matches (with Ann McCrary); Hard Times (Bill Frisell); God's Wing'ed Horse; That's How I Got To Memphis; introduction of Tom T. Hall; Pay No Attention To Alice (Tom T. Hall); Homecoming (Tom T. Hall); Shenandoah (instrumental); Love Hurts (with Emmylou Harris); Burning The Midnight Oil (with Emmylou Harris); Walk Away Renee (with Emmylou Harris); Wide River To Cross (with Emmylou Harris ); Somewhere Trouble Don't Go (with the McCrary Sisters); Don't Tell Me (with Emmylou Harris);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Miller, Buddy (Musician); Harris, Emmylou; Hall, Tom T.; Frisell, Bill; McCrary Sisters; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
